directions: Whisk mayonnaise, ketchup, and garlic powder together in a bowl; add Worcestershire sauce to the mayonnaise mixture and whisk until smooth.
Sprinkle enough black pepper over the surface of the mayonnaise mixture to cover; stir to incorporate. Repeat sprinkling and stirring of black pepper.
Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate until the seasonings have blended into the sauce, at least 2 hours.
ingredients: 1/2 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, or more to taste
title: Zaxby's Chicken Fingers Dipping Sauce
